"Extreme Eradication I":
"My requests from here on out won't be getting
any easier. Just turn around and walk the other
way if you don't think you can handle it. I want
you to destroy a massive number of D-arkers, but
they have to be tougher than the ones you
fought before. You choose where. This shouldn't
be impossible for you, based on your performance
so far, but I can't really recommend you actually
do it. Think carefully, now.
*Target: Hostiles level 21 or higher"
"マイルドマイルド・マーダー・Ⅰ"

"さて、ここからは軽くじゃすまない
依頼内容になっていくよ。
その気がないのならＵターンだ。
場所は問わない。
より強力な敵の出現する状況下で
闊歩するダーカーの大規模殲滅だ。
あんたの力なら不可能じゃないだろうけど
おすすめはしないよ。よく考えな。

※Lv.21～のエネミーが対象"
